answers.author: Brian Wolverton
answers.text:
I know John personally and I don't think there's a manager out there with a longer tenure.  The CT Conference of Municipalities recently regognized him for this accomplishment, and they were unable to find anyone in the US who could beat his record.  He will be retiring this year and will be sorely missed.
